subtitle.Text: I feel like one of the best bits of advice was actually from the Fullbright team before going in to do the first recording, and it was a suggestion that I should watch some episodes of My So-Called Life.

Which was great, because I’d watched them all when they were actually on, it was one of those favorite shows my sister and I would sit down and watch every week. And so going back and watching them was definitely not a hard chore to have to do.
So I basically went through all of the episodes I could find online in a couple of days, so it was a bit of a sudden binge watch of My So-Called Life.

But it was great, because I think watching My So-Called Life was a nice reminder of what a more natural presentation of a teenager is. So it was really… I don’t know if it would have gone as well had I not done that.
